entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 6.
